 Pointer to the base address of the buffer containing the frame of video (when being acquired as whole frames).

Detailed Description

Background acquisition buffer addresses structure.

A pointer this structure is returned by calls to FIFO_BackgroundGetFrame() and FIFO_StopBackgroundGetFrame(). It contains pointers to the memory buffers containing the newly acquired frame of video.

Do not alter the contents of this structure. You may, however alter the video data in the buffers.
